This printer has no jobs in its queue.
40 St George Street, Toronto, ON M5S 2E4
The Bahen Centre hosts the majority of the labs. The labs are located in the following rooms: BA 2200, BA 2220, BA 2270, BA 3175, BA 3185, BA 3195, and BA 3200.

CS Teaching Labs offers an NX server for remote desktop connection from home or from your laptop via the wireless network. The NX technology attempts to greatly improve the experience of remote graphical connection over a slow Internet link by optimising perceived speed of response and allowing one to suspend a graphical session and reconnect to it later. You can also connect to CS Teaching Labs\'s NX server from any CS Teaching Labs workstation or Information Commons workstation using a specially crafted profile.

CS Teaching Labs %1$s by Eugene Cheung

Report bugs or request features on GitHub.

Find out more about the CS Teaching Labs in their FAQ.
This app is not affiliated with the CS Teaching Labs or the University of Toronto in any way.
